synopsis.text: Kanto region's tranquil port town is home to the isolated Alma Tandoji, a young man with a troubled past. Burdened by the uncontrollable power of Sacred Seven, he has vowed to never use it again after accidentally causing harm to others. However, his quiet life is disrupted when Ruri Alba, accompanied by her butler and maids, approaches him with a plea to harness his dormant power. Initially reluctant, Alma's resolve is tested when a menacing creature known as the Dark Stone threatens his town. As his power spirals out of control, Ruri steps in to help him channel it effectively. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, Alma must confront his past and master the Sacred Seven to defeat the Dark Stone. Will he rise to the challenge and become the hero the world needs?
